params.playerA: The player A of the game
params.playerB: The player B of the game

params.playerA: The player A of the game
params.playerB: The player B of the game

params.boardContract: address of the smart contract that represents the board
params.name: name of the board
params.pawnIndex: array that represents the pawn index from the set of the pawns to add
params.pawnSetAddress: the address of the set of pawn to use for the board
params.x: array that represents the x coordinates where to add the pawns
params.y: array that represents the y coordinates where to add the pawns

params.winner: player that won the game (0 or 1)

returns._0: address of the smart contract of the board

params.pawnIndex: index of the pawn in the pawn set

returns._0: address of the pawn smart contract
number of pawns placed on a board
the number of game occurences of the board

params.turnNumber: the number of the current turn in the game, even number means player A, odd number means player B

returns._0: 0 if it's player A, 1 if it's player B, -1 if this address is not part of the game

returns.state: the initial state of the board

returns._0: true if the game has been finished, revert if the game doesn't exist

returns.isWaiting: true if a player is currently waiting

BoardCreated(address,uint256,string).notice: Emitted when a new board is created

GameFinished(address,address,address,uin.notice: Emitted when a new game is finished

GameStarted(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when a new game is started

finishGame(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Finish a game, this function can only be called by the ethBoards contract, this contract ensure the winner is legit

getBoardContractAddress(uint256).notice: Get the address of the smart contract of the board

getBoardPawnContract(uint256,uint8).notice: Get pawn smart contract of a specific pawn in the pawn set of the board

getBoardPawnNumber(uint256).notice: Get the number of pawns placed on a board

getGameNumber(uint256).notice: Get the number of game occurences of a board

getGamePlayerAddress(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Get the address of a player in the game

getGamePlayerIndex(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Check from the player address, if it's player A or B

getInitialState(uint256).notice: Get the initial state of a board

isGameOver(uint256,uint256).notice: Check if a specifc game of a board is finished

isWaitingPlayer(uint256).notice: Check if a player is currently waiting to play a game on a board

joinGame(uint256).notice: Join a new game on a board. When a player joins a game, he's in the waiting room for the game, if someone is present in the waiting room, the game is started against this player

userdoc.notice: The storage contract, store the informations about boards and games
